issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Missing apache license headers for some files
fields.summary: Missing license headers for some files

In addition to .java files, there are lots of .xml, .genavro, .properties, etc. files that are missing licenses.  There are some files (e.g., .json, jdiff) which cannot include licenses.  We really need a list of RAT exclusions, patterns that match files which don't have licenses.
